My little one has been attending Little Splashes Aquatics at Siglap and it has contributed so much to her love for water! Thanks to Teacher Anas, she has been so confident and unafraid to jump into a pool when she sees one ‚ò∫Ô∏è Thank you to the wondering folks at LSA and keep doing what you do!

Not to forget to mention, they have awesome facilities for showering, even a baby tub for your little one, so you can be ready for your day after a swimming session ü§©

We‚Äôve had a fantastic experience with our daughter‚Äôs swim class, thanks to Coach Anas! He is patient, encouraging, and great with toddlers, making each session fun while ensuring they build confidence in the water.

My 1 year old toddler has been going to Little Splashes Siglap for the past term and she enjoys it very much! Teacher Hazel is very patient and good with little kids, which made my toddler feel very at ease as she builds up her water confidence through fun songs and activities to teach various skills like kicking, water submersion, safe entrance/ exit from pool, blowing bubbles, backfloat, free float‚Ä¶. The staff there are also generally very friendly. The props at the pool are great too, the amenities are complete with good showering and diaper changing areas. Also love how the Siglap area is generally quiet and peaceful so I dun stimulate my toddler unnecessarily.

We've been here for over 10mths and have smoothly progressed from parent-accompanied to independent class as Teacher Anas has been so patient and very encouraging! 3yo enjoys lessons with Teacher Anas and wish she can stay longer in the pool.  :)
Teacher Anas is very patient with my son, Caleb. He has a great way with kids and is very thorough in his teaching. Caleb always looks forward to every class.
